creator: apache.org-bugzilla@dale.us
text:
fresh build of openssl 0.9.7c (tried do_nasm, do_masm, or do_ms)
fresh build of httpd 2.0.48 (tried both command line and InstallBin.dsw)

crashes when starting httpd.  MS VC shows this error (same for all builds) when
debug is clicked:

unhandled exception in apache.exe (libapr.dll): 0xC00000FD: Stack Overflow

only thing changed is the mod_ssl LoadModule line in httpd.conf.

Apache starts fine when this is commented.

creator: apache.org-bugzilla@dale.us
text: 5th compile attempt it started working... not sure why.
